TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: If this thread is deleted.............. WE WILL HAVE NO FUN! But Chobit will stop trying to kill us......... BUT THAT IS FUN!

If this thread is deleted.............. WE WILL HAVE NO FUN! But Chobit will stop trying to kill us......... BUT THAT IS FUN!

Working on it! *gets in helicopter designed by jeb*

But why would this thread be deleted. This is a no topic thread and its in the off topic forum so there is no on topic as the off topic is the on topic but that's is then off topic. There is just the Topic that can't be banned.

But why would this thread be deleted. This is a no topic thread and its in the off topic forum so there is no on topic as the off topic is the on topic but that's is then off topic. There is just the Topic that can't be banned.

Great, you caused Bob's head to explode! *takes controls*
*activates defense forcefield that surrounds Polaris* Why? I might do something........ *I stare at a big red button*

There is only one sure way she will kill us:

You can mock me personally. You can insult my artwork. BUT DON'T #$*% WITH MY POULTRY!

By the way, lovely poultry chobit

Edited May 20, 2013 by LeonG17

There is only one sure way she will kill us:

*notices note*

Yuma messed with my poultry.

Ah. Crap.

Great, you caused Bob's head to explode! *takes controls*

nooooooooooo jeb

Did you just mess with her poultry, please tell me you did not mess with her poultry...

Otherwise we are all dead.

Did you just mess with her poultry, please tell me you did not mess with her poultry...

Read the note...
Must.... Press..... Red.... BUTTON!!!!!!!!!! *presses it* Um, there goes the Milky Way galaxy. But Polaris is in the Andromeda galaxy.

*airship blown into Kerbin collision course*

Yuma, when I get my hands on your smug face... LEON! DO SOMETHING!

And you have just messed with Chobit's poultry. We are all dead.

HARD STARBOARD!!!

And you have just messed with Chobit's poultry. We are all dead.

HARD STARBOARD!!!

OKAY! *forgets the fact that I destroyed the Milky Way galaxy*
Are we going to die now?
I have a plan! More red buttons!
infinte red buttons
No, really.

No, really.

*presses it*
Warning, you have chosen to detonate all nuclear warheads. Do you wish to proceed?
WHY NOT PROCEED? Oops. *dies*
You have just destroyed the earth, have a pleasant day.
Wasn't earth already destroyed when I destroyed the Milky Way galaxy?

Thank you for pressing the self-destruct button.

This thread will self-destruct in exactly two minutes.

You fools... It was Earth all along!

(It may actually not be Earth but the entire Universe. If you have any problems with the destruction of the Universe please refrain from pressing the red button again)
